dx-style The style component allows you to use domx's component inline style syntax to add style and responsive properties to any element. <!-- Attributes: - [css-prop]--[breakpoint]:[psuedo-element]="[css-value]" --> <!-- Wrap an element or a group of elements you want to style --> <dx-style font-size="32px" font-size--960="64px" color="white" color:hover="red"> <span>Some Text</span> </dx-style> <!-- This will apply to all the list elements --> <ul> <dx-style font-size="32px"> <li>All these children will be 32px</li> <li>All these children will be 32px</li> <li>All these children will be 32px</li> <li>All these children will be 32px</li> </dx-style> </ul> <!-- Or target elements --> <dx-style selector="ul > li" font-size="32px"></dx-style> <ul> <li>All these children will be 32px</li> <li>All these children will be 32px</li> <li>All these children will be 32px</li> <li>All these children will be 32px</li> </ul>
